Identification_Area.title: Overview of the Las Cumbres Observatory (LCOGT) Derived FLI Data Product Collection

Citation_Information.description: Overview of the Las Cumbres Observatory (LCOGT) FLI Derived Data Product Collection. This collection consists of the photometry summary tables.

Internal_Reference.comment: Las Cumbres Observatory DART Uncalibrated, Calibrated SIS document which describes the Las Cumbres Observatory DART data products.

External_Reference.reference_text: Bertin, E.; Arnouts, S., 1996, SExtractor: Software for source extraction. Astronomy and Astrophysics Supplement, 117, 393â€“404, doi:10.1051/aas:1996164

External_Reference.description: Describes open source software package used to schedule and reduce Didymos observations
